QCMethod Class Reference

A simple class which contains the basic specification for a QC /// analysis method. Typically populated from a row in the QCA file. More...

Detailed Description

A simple class which contains the basic specification for a QC /// analysis method. Typically populated from a row in the QCA file.

Definition at line 46 of file QCAnalysisOptions.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum QCMethod::AnalysisType

Enumeration of possible analysis types.

Enumerator:
DM 

DM Call Rate.

GENDER 

EM ChrX Het Rate Gender Call.

HOMHILO 

Min Diff between Hom Peak and Valley.

ADJHOMHILO 

Adjusted Hom Min Hi Low used for SNP6.
